channel.title: How to connect to SSH before Tor if i use whonix gateway and debian
channel.description:
hello
i was searching info about how i can configure whonix gateway and the ssh tunnel
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_SSH_before_Tor
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Introduction
but i have some doubts ..
what steps are needed to configure the ssh server in whonix gateway ?
this steps are correct?
https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=es&tl=en&js=y&prev=_t&hl=es&ie=UTF-8&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.redeszone.net%2Fgnu-linux%2Fservidor-ssh-en-ubuntu%2F&edit-text=&act=url
and when i put it in the console
lynx check.torproject.org
Can't Access `file://localhost/home/user/check.torproject.org' Alert!: Unable to access document.
what should i do ?
thank you very much

item.title: How to connect to SSH before Tor if i use whonix gateway and debian
item.dc:creator: y010
item.description:
hello

i was searching info about how i can configure whonix gateway and the ssh tunnel

Whonix

Tunnels/Connecting to SSH before Tor

Instructions on how to connect to SSH before Tor (User -> SSH -> Tor -> Internet)

Whonix

Tunnels/Introduction

Instructions on how to combine tunnels (VPN, SSH, proxy) with Tor. (User -> Tor -> proxy/VPN/SSH -> Internet) (User -> proxy/VPN/SSH ->...

but i have some doubts …

what steps are needed to configure the ssh server in whonix gateway ?

this steps are correct?

https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=es&tl=en&js=y&prev=_t&hl=es&ie=UTF-8&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.redeszone.net%2Fgnu-linux%2Fservidor-ssh-en-ubuntu%2F&edit-text=&act=url

and when i put it in the console

lynx check.torproject.org

Can’t Access `file://localhost/home/user/check.torproject.org’
Alert!: Unable to access document.

what should i do ?

thank you very much

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect to SSH before Tor if i use whonix gateway and debian
